!Great master [Brom]: The goddess of death opened her eyes, the monsters Of [shilen] build insidious concepts in order to conquer Aden. The courageous advance guard of Aden revealed not far from [Zapretnykh] [Vrat] before the cave the lair of the malicious essences and it attempted to destroy it. Brave men were missing, and we intended to send the reconnaissance detachment by them down the help. If you render us assistance before this difficult march, then I help to you to open before itself new force. (After reaching of 76-[go] of [urovnya] is accessible 3-[ya] of [professiya].)
